project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Messages appear in the correct chronological order
Unread messages are clearly indicated to the user
Users can see when the other party is typing
non_functional: System should handle at least 10,000 concurrent users

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and receive one-to-one video calls in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can initiate a video call from a chat window
Video and audio quality remain stable with latency under 200ms
Users can mute/unmute audio and enable/disable video during the call
Call ends cleanly when either party disconnects
dependencies: WebRTC or similar video streaming technology
non_functional: Support for at least 720p video resolution

notes: No actionable feedback was provided ('hujgvbkh'). Requirements remain unchanged from the previous version.
